heading: Project Logistics Services
subheading: Specialized solutions for heavy, oversized, and complex cargo.
p1: Navex Global provides comprehensive project logistics solutions designed to support the movement of large, heavy, and complex cargo for industrial, construction, energy, and infrastructure projects.
p2: Our team manages route planning, equipment arrangements, permits, and coordination with port authorities to ensure every project shipment moves safely and efficiently.
p3: With expertise in handling oversized cargo, breakbulk shipments, and specialized lifting operations, we deliver tailored solutions based on project timelines and technical requirements.
p4: We work closely with reliable carriers, crane operators, and ground logistics teams to execute safe loading, unloading, and transportation of high-value project cargo.
p5: From origin to final site delivery, Navex Global ensures full visibility, risk management, and seamless coordination across every phase of the project logistics process.
